knimeNode.name: UWW KMeans Clustering
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs k-means clustering on input data.

fullDescription.intro: This node performs k-means clustering algorithm on numerical data. K-means partitions the input data into k clusters where each observation belongs to the cluster with the nearest centroid.
fullDescription.option: The number of clusters to create.
Maximum number of iterations for convergence.

ports.inPort: Table containing numerical data to cluster
